name: Duck 'N Weave - Google Play
description:
You are a Duck who has escaped the chopping block! Now destroy the Chef's kitchen and escape as fast as possible!

Earn Coins and chase High Scores by causing as much destruction as possible and escaping the kitchen, while a cleaver throwing Chef hunts you down!

Spend coins on new Skins & Accessories

Originally built for Untitled Game Jam #37, rebuilt for Mobile & Tablets to learn the Google Play development process.

-Localized for 24 languages, released in 106 Countries/Regions
